simplex2D(int, float, float, float) - Method in class heroesgrave.utils.math.Perlin
Deprecated.
Calculates a random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1,
based on the interpolated value of random fractional corner values that are added on different scales.

Also, don't ask why all the variables are made final.
SimplexNoise - Class in heroesgrave.utils.math
A speed-improved simplex noise algorithm for 2D, 3D and 4D in Java.
SimplexNoise(long) - Constructor for class heroesgrave.utils.math.SimplexNoise
Create's a new Simplex-Noise instance, that can be used for pseudorandom number-generation.
